STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: The Ultimate Companion for Soccer Fans
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - hear from the soccer fans using our app.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has completely changed how I follow my favorite teams and players. The real-time updates and in-depth stats are game-changers.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a coach, this app gives me invaluable insights into player performance and team tactics. The video analysis tools are especially useful.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm checking scores on the go or diving deep into league standings, this app has everything a soccer fanatic needs.
FAQ_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Soccer App
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about using our app for soccer fans
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What features does the soccer app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides live scores, team news, player stats, match highlights, and discussion forums for all major soccer leagues and competitions around the world.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How can I follow my favorite teams and players?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: You can create a personalized feed by selecting your favorite teams and players. This will keep you updated with the latest news, scores, and stats for the teams and players you follow.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I watch live matches on the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: While we don't currently offer live streaming of full matches, you can access live scores, play-by-play updates, and video highlights of key moments from ongoing games.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is the app free to use?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our soccer app is completely free to download and use. However, we do offer an optional premium subscription that unlocks additional features and removes ads.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How can I provide feedback or report an issue?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We value your feedback! You can contact our support team directly from within the app or via email at support@soccerapp.com to report any issues or suggest new features.

SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log In to Track Your Favorite Teams
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay connected with the beautiful game. Follow live scores, stats, and updates from your favorite teams and leagues. Brought to you by passionate soccer enthusiasts.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay up-to-date with real-time scores, highlights, and stats from your favorite soccer matches around the world.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Follow your favorite clubs and receive tailored news, rumors, and analysis about their latest performances and transfers.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Join or create fantasy leagues with friends, draft your dream team, and compete against others for the ultimate bragging rights.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Relive the most exciting moments with HD video highlights of amazing goals, skills, and celebrations from top leagues.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Get in-depth coverage, expert opinions, and insightful analysis on the latest soccer news, tactics, and player performances.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Never miss a game with customizable calendars that sync with your favorite teams' schedules across all competitions.
CTA_BODY: Stay ahead of the competition with our cutting-edge soccer app. Track your stats, analyze your performance, and take your skills to new heights.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Soccer App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What features does the app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our soccer app provides live scores, match highlights, team and player stats, news updates, and the ability to follow your favorite teams and players.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I watch live matches on the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: No, our app does not currently offer live streaming of matches. However, you can access live scores, commentary, and highlights as the matches are happening.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How can I personalize the app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: You can personalize the app by selecting your favorite teams and players. This will ensure you receive notifications and updates specifically related to them.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our soccer app is completely free to download and use. We may introduce optional premium features in the future, but the core functionality will remain free.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Never miss a moment of the action with real-time scores and updates from your favorite soccer leagues and teams.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Gain deep insights into every match with comprehensive stats, player ratings, and expert analysis.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Stay up-to-date with the latest soccer news, rumors, and analysis tailored to your favorite teams and players.
